Class GradedActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • GradedActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Essay

    public class GradedActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    The GradedActivity class contains information about graded activities.

      • setScore

        public void setScore(int s)
        The setScore method will set the score of the activity to the given input.
        Parameters:
        s - This input is the score of the activity.
        Throws:
        InvalidScoreException - This occurrs when a score is outside of the acceptable range.
